bug.short_desc: transfig 3.2.6 has been released, please update
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
xfig / transfig have a new upstream maintainer and 3.2.6 has been released, incorporating all patches from all distros.
I've already updated xfig for F25+ to 3.2.6, can you please update transfig? Note the tarbal is now called fig2dev and can be found here:
https://sourceforge.net/projects/mcj/

Hi Hans, I have updated spec file and submited it into rawhide. In compared to previous version there are missing some binaries. I will be happy if someone can test if it works as expected.
I have dropped all patches. There were some patches to IMakefile which was replaced by autotools. The other patches were already applied. I wasn't able to apply patch CVE-2009-4227. The file is missing so it is not usable. I will be happy if someone else could confirm that it is okay. Maybe Tomas Repik can look on that (-;

(In reply to Jozef Mlich from comment #1) > Hi Hans, I have updated spec file and submited it into rawhide. In compared > to previous version there are missing some binaries. I will be happy if > someone can test if it works as expected.
Looks good, thanks for doing this.
> I have dropped all patches. There were some patches to IMakefile which was > replaced by autotools. The other patches were already applied. I wasn't able > to apply patch CVE-2009-4227. The file is missing so it is not usable.
Huh, I see the file just fine in fig2dev-3.2.6, anyways I've checked and the patch is already applied, so this is not a problem.
Thank you for taking care of the update.
Note f25 has already branched off. I've merged the master branch into the f25 branch and started a build of transfig-3.2.6 there as well.
